page.title: 20MAYDAY SINGING
page.content: { Mayday }Every year our school does Mayday singing for all the village on Mayday.We learn some songs and make standards out of flowers .We make a standard for every class.We walk round the village singing.We sing at different places all over the village. Some people give us money and sweets! The money goes to the old peoples fund { SWORD DANCING. The boys do {SWORD DANCING.}We use swords.We wear special dress for this dance.We wear red socks,black trousers ,white shirt and a red sash.Some of the dances are very difficult. { MAYPOLE DANCING. The girls do{Maypole Dancing.}They dance round the maypole with ribbons. The ribbons make patterns.The girls wear colourful skirts.
